jobs.name: Senior Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: As a senior full-stack developer at Faith you will be pioneering development efforts on our flagship mobile application. As a natural leader of the team, others will seek you out for questions. This most likely isnâ€™t your first time creating scalable, maintainable software so writing unit and integration tests must be second nature. If you seek a challenging opportunity with ample opportunity for career development at a fast paced startup while working from home, this is it!
skills: Held full-time remote job in the past
Capable of writing unit and integration tests
Experience deploying to Apple App Store and Google Play Store
